title: ANYTHING related to Louis Sockalexis or Roy Castleton
author: Archive

posts.post_title: ANYTHING related to Louis Sockalexis or Roy Castleton
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
Photos, postcards, autographs, newspaper articles, ANYTHING related to Louis Sockalexis.  He played for Holy Cross university from 1895-96 and the Cleveland Indians from 1897-99, then for Lowell Massachussetts in 1902.  

Also looking for any and all Roy Castleton items, played in the PCL from 1909-1913 and also played for Youngstown Ohio before that.  Has Zeenut/Obak etc cards.  I also need a signature as well (only died in 1967 but cant find an autograph).

Rhys Yeakley

posts.post_title: ANYTHING related to Louis Sockalexis or Roy Castleton
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
Rhys,
I have a nice long article about Sockalexis.  If you send your address, I'll send a copy in the mail.  Actually, now that I think of it, I could just scan it and sent it on.  It's in my file cabinet at work, so I'll get it tomorrow.  Also, I assume you know there is a book.
Mark

posts.post_title: ANYTHING related to Louis Sockalexis or Roy Castleton
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dan Bretta
Rhys, If you're interested in American Indians who have played in the Majors there is a really good book that came out within the last two months by Jeffrey Powers-Beck titled "The American Indian Integration of Baseball".  It contains a lot of information on Sockalexis.  I recently purchased it for its content on the Nebraska Indians Baseball Club.

[url]http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0803237456/ref=olp_product_details/102-7203759-6848157?%5Fencoding=UTF8&v=glance[/url]
